column4: hey ppls - i just installed UBUNTU Desktop on my Dell E1705 notebook. But when i try to boot it comes up with an error - kernel panic - not syncing - vfs - unable to moot root fs - on unknown block (0,0) --- Can anyone help me ?
how do i reinstall Grub on my hdd if im booting from the live cdrom ?

grub is the default Ubuntu boot manager. Lost grub after installing windows: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/RecoveringUbuntuAfterInstallingWindows - Making GRUB floppies & other GRUB howtos: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/GrubHowto
